com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.entity.influence.util
Class InfluenceManager

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.unit.Manager
      com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.entity.influence.util.InfluenceManager

public class InfluenceManager
extends Manager

InfluenceManager is a Manager that is responsible for managing all IInfluence of static entities.

InfluenceManager manages the creation of an IInfluence. It maintains an IInfluence pool which allows the system to reuse created IInfluence for multiple static entities. This means that InfluenceManager does not allow multiple IInfluence with the same EInfluence enumeration exist.

InfluenceManager does not allow destruction of an influence, since IInfluence objects are generally not resource intensive and the static entities which share these IInfluence always exist.

Version:
